bio.Recent_Position: Finance Leadership Development Program @ Thermo Fisher Scientific, Student Assistant for MBA Recruitment and Administration @ The Paul Merage School of Business
bio.Bios: Hey hey! I am Ronica, and I initiated with the Alpha Nu class during the spring quarter of my first year. I like to crochet, snowboard, and play video games in my free time. A fun fact about me is I am an only child :(. Ask me about my dream job of being a farmer and the best types of crops to grow during recruitment!
